title: Investigating linguistic and genetic shifts in East Indian tribal groups
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Bhavna Ahlawat, Hemlata Dewangan, Nagarjuna Pasupuleti, Aparna Dwivedi, Richa Rajpal, Saurabh Pandey, Lomous Kumar, Kumarasamy Thangaraj, Niraj Rai
